1_1PoA7YxWVZKoXWoD1PjdwByFqqCA8d2uqr.body: Yes I agree. It should also stop requiring an internet connection. Perhaps a satellite link implemented in software and utilising the wifi antenna would be a solution even though it may be laggy. Oh and FFS why does it have to use space on our hard drives? Can't it simply store the data online instead?
